name: Save The Cradel
description:
You are a protagonist that was summoned to save the roots of the Great Tree of Life. You have to find your way to the deepest level of the taproot and deliver an artifact that will heal the roots and the tree. There are enemies you have to face and NPCs you can talk to.

Please note that the game has a fully working loop with player weapons and other collectables throughout the game. Our project leader got sick and we had to figure out what we needed to do while not having an artist till about 2 days ago.  I personally love the story or narrative that we created, but the game lacks some serious polish.

Controls:

A / D  - Movement
Space - Jump
E - Interact with NPCs
Mouse - Aim your gun

Left Click - Shoot your gun.

There is no menu in-game so unfortunately if you want to leave then alt+f4 is your friend.
